noun.description: A statement that a situation is unsatisfactory or unacceptable.
examples: I intend to make an official complaint
there were complaints that the building was an eyesore

noun.description: An illness or medical condition, especially a relatively minor one.
examples: she is receiving treatment for her skin complaint

origin: Late Middle English: from Old French complainte, feminine past participle of complaindre to lament (see complain).
